member.name: T:UnityEngine.ImageConversion
member.summary: This class provides utility and extension methods to convert image data from or to PNG, EXR, TGA, and JPEG formats.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.ImageConversion.EncodeToTGA(UnityEngine.Texture2D)
member.summary: Encodes the specified texture in TGA format.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.ImageConversion.EncodeToPNG(UnityEngine.Texture2D)
member.summary: Encodes this texture into PNG format.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.ImageConversion.EncodeToJPG(UnityEngine.Texture2D,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes this texture into JPG format.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.ImageConversion.EncodeToJPG(UnityEngine.Texture2D)
member.summary: Encodes this texture into JPG format.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.ImageConversion.EncodeToEXR(UnityEngine.Texture2D,UnityEngine.Texture2D.EXRFlags)
member.summary: Encodes this texture into the EXR format.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.ImageConversion.EncodeToEXR(UnityEngine.Texture2D)
member.summary: Encodes this texture into the EXR format.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.ImageConversion.LoadImage(UnityEngine.Texture2D,System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads PNG/JPG image byte array into a texture.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.ImageConversion.LoadImage(UnityEngine.Texture2D,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Loads PNG/JPG image byte array into a texture.
